UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Novel Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from Anoplin and Its Activity on Bacterial Pneumonia in Mice.
Literature.Author: Gou S, Li B, Ouyang X, Ba Z, Zhong C, Zhang T, Chang L, Zhu Y, Zhang J, Zhu N, Zhang Y, Liu H, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>=512 µM,Human glomerular mesangial cells (GMC):IC50=91.88 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=64µM)
